entities.name: birthday presents
entities.description: The text mentions that Harry's birthday presents contained a basilisk egg disguised as a carriage clock.

entities.name: basilisk egg
entities.description: A cunningly disguised object in Harry's birthday presents, later revealed to be a carriage clock.

entities.name: carriage clock
entities.description: An object that was mistaken for the basilisk egg and smashed by Harry.

entities.name: Moody
entities.description: A character who is revealed to be Mad-Eye, speaking in a menacing voice.

entities.name: Mad-Eye
entities.description: Moody's real first name, mentioned by Dumbledore.

entities.name: Dumbledore
entities.description: A character who is speaking to everyone gathered in the room and trying to resolve the situation.

entities.name: Karkaroff
entities.description: A character who is being spoken to by Moody and is burning with anger.

entities.name: Cedric
entities.description: One of the students chosen to compete in the Tournament, mentioned by Dumbledore.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: The main character who is also chosen to compete in the Tournament and has received birthday presents with a basilisk egg.

relationships.description: Moody is scolding Karkaroff in a menacing voice, as mentioned by the text.
Dumbledore is speaking to everyone gathered in the room, trying to resolve the situation.
Both Cedric and Harry have been chosen to compete in the Tournament, as mentioned by Dumbledore.
